description.plain:
Muni Long is an alias of Priscilla Renea, a singer, songwriter, and occasional rapper from Vero Beach, Florida.

Under this alias, which the artist adopted in 2020 and currently performs under, she has released four EPs: Black Like This, Nobody Knows, Public Displays Of Affection, Public Displays Of Affection Too, and one LP: Public Displays Of Affection: The Album. Muni Long became the first independent woman artist to top the Billboard R&B/Hip-Hop Airplay chart when her song “Hrs and Hrs” hit #1 and stayed there for six weeks.

She is signed to Def Jam Recordings in a partnership with her own independent label, Supergiant Records.

body.plain:
Muni Long is an alias of Priscilla Renea, a singer, songwriter, and occasional rapper from Vero Beach, Florida.

Under this alias, which the artist adopted in 2020 and currently performs under, she has released four EPs: Black Like This, Nobody Knows, Public Displays Of Affection, Public Displays Of Affection Too, and one LP: Public Displays Of Affection: The Album. Muni Long became the first independent woman artist to top the Billboard R&B/Hip-Hop Airplay chart when her song “Hrs and Hrs” hit #1 and stayed there for six weeks.

She is signed to Def Jam Recordings in a partnership with her own independent label, Supergiant Records.

songs.title: Hrs & Hrs

description.plain:
Describing various forms of intimate quality time between two partners, “Hrs & Hrs” is Priscilla Renea’s first successful record under her Muni Long moniker.

Developed as a freestyle and initially recorded as a demo, the singer eventually included it during her sessions for Public Displays Of Affection, where it would become the EP’s third single following “No R&B”  and “No Signal.” It would also be included on her 2022 LP Public Displays of Affection: The Album.

A big contributor to its success is TikTok, where it was used as part of the #HrsandHrsChallenge.

songs.embed_content: Read “Hrs & Hrs” by Muni Long on Genius

album.full_title: Public Displays Of Affection by Muni Long
album.name: Public Displays Of Affection

songs.lyrics:

Do you feel that pain?
That pain, oh, oh (Oh, no)
That's that pain (I know)

I hope you cry

When all I wanted was forever

That's that pain

Feel what I feel, what I felt, what I felt
